required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluate the Tolerance, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Germinal Peptide Eye Drops in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Tolerance, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Germinal Peptide Eye Drops in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: Phase I Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Tolerance, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Germinal Peptide Eye Drops in Healthy Volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: The subjects enrolled in this study are healthy volunteers, divided into single dose groups and multiple doses groups with dose escalation.The study is designed to assign the subjects to five single-dose groups from low to high (0.0005%, 0.001%, 0.002%, 0.004% and 0.008%), and three multiple-dose groups (0.002%, 0.004% and 0.008%), with both male and female subjects in each group. This clinical trial is a double-blind design.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Ocular signs: conjunctival congestion, corneal epithelial injury, conjunctival edema, anterior chamber glow.

secondary_outcome.description: Examination of cornea, conjunctiva, sclera, lens and vitreous body.
Observe the change of intraocular pressure.
Observe the occurrence and record of AE.
Observe the change of corneal fluorescein staining.

arm_group.description: Two subjects will be treated with Germinal peptide eye drops 0.0005% single dose.
Ten subjects will be treated with Germinal peptide eye drops 0.001% single dose (eight treatment and two placebo).
Ten subjects will be treated with Germinal peptide eye drops 0.002% single dose (eight treatment and two placebo).
Ten subjects will be treated with Germinal peptide eye drops 0.004% single dose (eight treatment and two placebo).
Ten subjects will be treated with Germinal peptide eye drops 0.008% single dose (eight treatment and two placebo).
Ten subjects will be treated with Germinal peptide eye drops 0.002% multiple dose (eight treatment and two placebo).
Ten subjects will be treated with Germinal peptide eye drops 0.004% multiple dose (eight treatment and two placebo).
Ten subjects will be treated with Germinal peptide eye drops 0.008% multiple dose (eight treatment and two placebo).

intervention.description: Germinal peptide eye drops of 0.0005%, 0.001%, 0.002%, 0.004% and 0.008%
